text: Grand Cayman is the largest of the three Cayman Islands at about 196 kmÂ² and contains the capital George Town. Towns on the island are referred to as "districts". The island is a popular tourist spot because of its coral reefs. Snorkeling and scuba diving are popular activities. Owen Roberts International Airport serves the island with domestic and international flights. ==Other websites== * * Cayman Islands Government * Grand Cayman on Google Maps. Category:Cayman Islands
title: Grand Cayman
